snippet.title: Bending the Light - Oculus Rift Trailer
snippet.description:
Submerge yourself in a dreamy, atmospheric world filled with brilliant beams of light. Use magnetic orbs and bronze mirrors to bend the light and charge the energy cells. 

Features:

- 40 light-bending puzzle levels
- Secret collectables to discover in every level
- Super-secret puzzle to solve in every level
- Designed exclusively for Rift and Touch
- Playable with gamepad
- Includes keyboard controls for those without Touch or gamepad
- Comfortable and unpressured, yet engaging and involved
- Few will achieve 100%. Do you have the mental fortitude?
